items.sentence: Tom has accumulated a lot of junk since he\'s moved into this house.
You\'ll get a ticket if you park the car in front of a fire hydrant.
You\'re going to wreck your eyesight if you play games all the time.
Did you really leave your car unlocked with the key in the ignition?
I think it\'s highly unlikely that Tom will get custody of the kids.
How could you not have known what was going on between Tom and Mary?
I want you to find out if Tom is planning on coming here by himself.
I was under the impression that Tom and Mary wanted to adopt a girl.
Tom said that he wanted to go to Boston, but he didn\'t tell us why.
Tom said that he\'d be more than happy to help Mary weed the garden.
The paramedic ripped open Tom\'s shirt and took a look at the wound.
The way Tom drives, he\'s going to have an accident sooner or later.
They\'re likely to cancel school tomorrow because of the heavy snow.
I wanted to give you something, but I wasn\'t sure what you\'d like.
If Tom had had enough money, he would have gone to Boston with Mary.
Tom asked Mary if she would ever consider going out with John again.
Let\'s not forget we never could have done this without Tom\'s help.
Obviously, I can\'t force you to do something you don\'t want to do.
I wonder whether or not there\'s a chance Tom will be here tomorrow.
Don\'t have anything to do with him. He is completely untrustworthy.
You\'re supposed to meet Tom in front of his hotel in about an hour.
After Tom explained it in French, he said the same thing in English.
After the earthquake, many people decided to sleep outside in tents.
You can\'t let Tom drive that old truck. Let him drive your new car.
According to the guidebook, this is the best restaurant around here.
I know Tom can play the clarinet? Can he play the saxophone as well?
I looked around me to see if anybody was paying any attention to me.
We were supposed to meet at the restaurant, but Tom never showed up.
Tom and Mary got married the week after they graduated from college.
Tom and Mary invited all their friends and relatives to the wedding.
Tom asked Mary to water the flowers in his garden while he was gone.
I haven\'t had the chance to tell you how much I enjoyed your party.
I hear you\'re selling your motorcycle. How much do you want for it?
Do you want me to just call Tom up and tell him that we can\'t come?
I have a lot of books in my library, but none of them are in French.
I almost always take a shower in the morning before going to school.
Tom and Mary are at one of the tables in the back of the restaurant.
Tom sensed that someone was behind him and turned to see who it was.
Tom had no reason to suspect Mary was the one who stole his bicycle.
I was scared to ask questions because I didn\'t want to look stupid.
Are you sure you don\'t want to come with me to get a cup of coffee?
Boston is a nice place to visit, but I wouldn\'t want to live there.
Can you think of any reason why Tom and Mary shouldn\'t get married?
Didn\'t you know that Tom was planning to go to Australia with Mary?
It\'s not that I don\'t love you, I just don\'t want to get married.
Tom said he doesn\'t know exactly what time he\'s going to get here.
Do you see the guy wearing the black jacket over there? That\'s Tom.
I think I have a pretty good idea what Tom might be doing right now.
Tom was in Boston last week, but I don\'t know if he\'s still there.
Tom just stood there watching Mary staring at herself in the mirror.
